text: obava utpadanaya kale allahya. pasuva ohuma obava maranayata pat karanneya. igena gena dæna sitiyada, kisivak nodanna aya men bavata pat vana mahalu viya dakva jivatva sitina ayada obagen æta. (obagen kavurun, kavurunva kopamana kalak athæra dama sitiya yutuda yanna) niyata vasayenma allah hondin danneku ha (ese kirimata) itamat balasampannayeku vasayen sitinneya
